=R=

==r bindings aus libsbml==
* Installation
  # install libsbml http://sourceforge.net/projects/sbml/files/libsbml/5.8.0/stable/Linux/64-bit/
  # install libsbml http://sourceforge.net/projects/sbml/files/libsbml/5.8.0/stable/Linux/64-bit/R%20interface/
  # R CMD INSTALL libSBML_5.8.0_R_x86_64-pc-linux-gnu.tar.gz
* Test
  - library(libSBML)
  - doc <- readSBML("ecoli_orth2011_msb201165-s3.xml")
  - ecoli <- SBMLDocument_getModel(doc)
  - Model_getNumSpecies(ecoli)
  - Model_getNumReactions(ecoli)
* API
  - http://sbml.org/Software/libSBML/docs/cpp-api (entspricht c++)
